channel.title: Want to know something
channel.description:
I have only seen it once... Is there a tutorial (leech proof or not) that has the coding for the see through box in the right upper-hand corner of the game interface with the text in it?
[b]PICTURE[/b] [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w208/Sentinel67/Box.jpg[/img]

item.title: Want to know something
item.dc:creator: @Maskmanator Maskmanator
item.description:
@Maskmanator wrote:

updated a picture of what I am talking about.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 04:50:54 PM[/size][hr]Copy of client.java:58: class client is public, should be declared in a file nam
ed client.java
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
^
client.java:112: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable serverLatency
location: class PlayerHandler
sendQuest(“Server Ping: @gre@”+PlayerHandler.serverLatency, 15897);
^
client.java:113: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable latency
location: class client
sendQuest(“Player Ping: @gre@”+latency, 15898);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

There was already a writePlayers void so I deleted it (it had my server name and players and all that good stuff already at the top middle of my screen) and replaced it with that code…

Read full topic

item.title: Want to know something
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Add this void:

[code]public void WritePlayers()
{
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
String owner = “YOURNAMEHERE”;
String LU = “Bug Fixes”;
String ver = “1.1”;
sendQuest(“SEVRERNAME “+ver, 15894);
sendQuest(””+players+" players currently online", 15895);
sendQuest(“Server Ping: @gre@”+PlayerHandler.serverLatency, 15897);
sendQuest(“Player Ping: @gre@”+latency, 15898);
sendQuest(“Latest Update: @whi@”+LU, 15899);
sendQuest(“Server Owner: @whi@”+owner, 15900);
sendQuest(“No Flaming or racism!”, 15901);
sendQuest("", 15896);
sendQuest("", 15902);
sendQuest("", 15903);
sendQuest("", 15904);
sendQuest("", 15905);
sendQuest("", 15906);

setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
}[/code]

Add this under boolean process:

WritePlayers();

Read full topic
